Peter's Mother-in-Law
Matthew 8:14, 15
    While the congregation in the synagogue were still spellbound with awe, Jesus withdrew to the home of Peter for a little rest. But here also a shadow had fallen. The mother of Peter's wife lay sick, stricken with a "great fever."   Jesus rebuked the disease, and the sufferer arose, and ministered to the wants of the Master and His disciples.--DA 259 (1898).
